channel.title: dmv_social on Lemmy Community Directory
channel.description: Recent content in dmv_social on Lemmy Community Directory

item.title: Alexandria, Virginia
item.description: /c/Alexandria, Virginia on dmv.social https://dmv.social/c/alexandria_va Description A community for Alexandria A few rules for this community: - Don’t be a jerk! This isn’t the place for bigotry, provoking users, name-calling, inciting harm, harassing others, spreading malicious misinformation, and other foul behavior. - No unlawful content. We’re not looking to get in trouble. - Don’t share other’s personal information. This includes names, addresses, contact information, and private data. - Keep it “generally SFW”.

item.title: dmv.social Support
item.description: /c/dmv.social Support on dmv.social https://dmv.social/c/support Description Support for issues related to dmv.social Please ensure your post contains: 1. What issue are you facing or what error occurred? 2. What did you try to do before the issue happened? 3. What were you expecting to happen instead? Details * Subscribers 1 Posts 0 Comments 0 Daily Active Users 0 Weekly Active Users 0 Monthly Active Users 0 Published 2023-06-14 22:11:43 Updated 2023-06-14 22:14:30 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:21

item.title: Washington, DC
item.description: /c/Washington, DC on dmv.social https://dmv.social/c/washington_dc Description A community for anything and everything DC! This community is for locals, visitors, and those around the area. Please refrain from national politics, unless it directly impacts DC at a local level. A few rules for this community: - Don’t be a jerk! This isn’t the place for bigotry, provoking users, name-calling, inciting harm, harassing others, spreading malicious misinformation, and other foul behavior. - No unlawful content.
